summary: When Nige finds himself in a spot of bother after a series of unfortunate incidents, he is forced to ask Deano for help. The problem is Deano is not really the kind of guy you should turn to in a crisis.
cast: Bret McKenzie|Hamish Blake|Maaka Pohatu|Filip Berg|Russell Smith|Erin Banks|Lee Hatherly|Jarin Towney|Charlie Britzman|Ian Mune|Tim Shadbolt|Steven Woller|Jim Baltaxe|Simon McArthur
title: Two Little Boys
